PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Full Guide: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d-x_kL90czU Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/EsoroGuidesBuild Updates:
NEW 3.13 CHANGES: - Beyond the changes to Gladiator this remains almost completely unchanged! We lost a bit of damage but it won't be enough to meaningfully affect the builds performance! - Made a variety of changes to the gearsets. - Added leveling gem information to the PoB
OLD CHANGES:
Other Notes: - For league starters, Assailum will be expensive for the first week of the league. Run a 5/6 link Puncture setup (covered in the video) until one can be picked up. - A well rolled Silvertongue unique bow is a fantastic budget option to use until you can find a suitable rare upgrade. - If you're running a budget rare bow look for large rolls of Damage over Time Multiplier (24-35%) in addition to strong physical damage. - A Replica Farrul's Fur can make for a fantastic high budget option for our body armour.
Leveling Notes:
Main Skills: 1-37: Split Arrow (G) + Pierce (G) + Chance to Bleed (R) + Vicious Projectiles (G) + Deadly Ailments (G) 38+ Split Arrow (G) + Chain (G) + Chance to Bleed (R) + Vicious Projectiles (G) + Deadly Ailments (G) + Brutality (R) 4+: Puncture (G) + Chance to Bleed (R) + Vicious Projectiles (G) + Deadly Ailments (G) + Swift Afflication (G) + Brutality (R)
Support Skills: 4+: Dash + Enduring Cry (R) + Second Wind (G) 4-23: War Banner (R) + Flesh and Stone (R) 16+: Ensnaring Arrow + Ballista Totem (R) + Maim (R) + Greater Multiple Projectiles (G) / Culling Strike (G) 24+: Flesh and Stone (R) + Malevolence (B) 38+: Immortal Call (R) + Cast when Damage Taken (R)
